content.question: The situation depicted in the image contributed most immediately to

choices.label: the organization of new labor unions to confront managerial power
businesses seeking control over markets and resources outside the United States
efforts by southern leaders to achieve industrial development similar to that of the North
the creation of a federal agency to regulate the money supply

content.answer: the organization of new labor unions to confront managerial power

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
